data.description: Obtain domain expiration date from whois inf
data.similar:
None. All existing modules for parsing WHOIS results are restricted
    to very small number of output syntaxes and doesn't extract
    expiration date anyway
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
There is Net::Domain namespace already, so I've shoosed
    Net::Domain::ExpireDate. Other choise may be Net::Whois::ExpireDate,
    if you think Net::Domain::ExpireDate is not sutable for this.
